title: Siduri Winemaker on Harvest Outlook
itunes:title: Siduri Winemaker on Harvest Outlook
description:
Matt Revelette, Winemaker for Siduri Wines, discusses the vineyard’s budding Chardonnay program.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
